title: MERN veggy
descr: Veggies is a platform to connect farmers and clients. This project is the Final Project of our Web Development Course.

title: Authentication form
descr: Basic authentication page in React with Redux and Express. Deployed on Heroku

title: Radio streamer
descr: Radio streamer built with React.js and React Hooks

title: React online shop
descr: Functional shop built with React. Filter, search bar, functional cart, delete item, reset cart function.

title: React To do list
descr: Functional to-do-list built with React. Add new element, check and delete solved tasks functions. React Hooks version also available.

title: Morse code translator
descr: A morse code translator, with a json database and React

title: Country API call
descr: Find your favorite country! A country API call built with axios in React.

title: Pizza shop
descr: A self-order pizza website built during the DCI course 2019-2020, with JS and DOM manipulation
